name: steelcase-stex-itcss-stylesheet
description: A simple ITCSS folder structure for Steelcase STEX store front.

scripts.build: npm run stylelint && node-sass --include-path scss scss/app.scss ../css3/styles.css --output-style compressed
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build-css
scripts.theme-deploy: npm install && npm run build && npm run clean && sfdx force:source:deploy -m StaticResource:B2C_Theme
